'''1.6.1''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released on September 17, 2018,<ref>{{tweet|Mega_Spud|1041706623214006272|Heads up! Phantoms have learned how to dive in the 1.6.1 #Minecraft hotfix that is rolling out now! Changelog:|September 17, 2018}}</ref> which fixes bugs.<ref name=changelog>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360015779511-Minecraft-1-6-1-Bedrock-|title=Minecraft - 1.6.1 (Bedrock)|date=September 17, 2018}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Added a button to clear login credentials if a Microsoft Account sign-in fails on Nintendo Switch.

== Fixes ==
* Phantoms now swoop down and attack players. ({{bug|MCPE-36673}})
* Fixed blocks often disappearing after being placed or reappearing after being destroyed. ({{bug|MCPE-31596}})
* Increased performance on iOS devices.
* Several fixes to reduce lag in multiplayer games and Realms.</onlyinclude>
